EmailTemplate.name: EM-202301-EMP-CHASO-EDUCATIONAL-EMAILS.Email 1 - Ebook
EmailTemplate.subject: Provide clients a deeper understanding of managing chronic conditions
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EBOOK Living with chronic conditions: Healthcare experiences, challenges and opportunities The number of people living with multiple chronic conditions within the U.S. is on the rise. Understanding the ways in which these individuals seek and receive care is the key to referring the right chronic condition management solution. The findings of our consumer insights study underscore the importance of delivering whole-person care to this growing population. Read the research report to learn more. <[[https://business.teladochealth.com/resources/report/living-with-chronic-conditions-healthcare-experiences-challenges/?&utm_source=tdh&utm_medium=email&utm_content=cc-ebook&utm_term=aso&utm_campaign=&utm_campaign_id=]]>

About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
